column5: Vi (Vee), he/him. Founder of Sympathy Systems.
column6: Odesa, 2044. A tactical RPG blending XCOM's combat depth with Shadowrun's storytelling. You play as an engineer in a living city shaped by your choices. Sabotage corporate infrastructure, manage scarce resources, and rebuild the resistance in grid-based battles where the environment is your weapon.
column13: Sympathy Systems is a Ukrainian indie studio led by Vi, a backend developer turned game creator. What began as a solo passion project has grown into a talented core team, including a 3D Environment Artist crafting our grounded world, a Narrative Designer, and a UI/UX Specialist. United by the "Odesa Futurism" vision, we focus on deep tactical systems and meaningful storytelling.

column6: L1TTL3 PAWS is a physics based arcade game where you play as a cat gliding over rolling hills while collecting flowers. Spend flowers to unlock 13 different playable cats, each with its own special traits. Completing all 13 islands unlocks a remix mode that is procedurally generated to be different every run. Originally created for the JS13K competition using, the entire game fits in a 13 kilobyte zip file, and the full source code is available on GitHub.
column13:
Frank Force is a game developer and artist based in Austin, Texas. He has been making games for 30+ years, from studio work at Rooster Teeth, Certain Affinity, Volition, and Midway Games to a large catalog of independent releases and creative tools.

Heâ€™s the creator of the open source LittleJS game engine and the ZzFX sound effects generator, and is known for JavaScript size coding, publishing 1,000+ tiny demos and micro-games. In 2019, his work won Optical Illusion of the Year, and the video has surpassed 3 million views. Some of his generative art is currently on display at Austin City Hall.

column5: the folks over at Merge Conflict Studio would be just fine :)
column6: Pelikeeper is a tower defense & base building comfort-strategy game where you play as the last pelican in a world swallowed by a shadowy fog. Build up and defend the settlement around your lighthouse, rescue lost animal neighbors, and return constellations to the cosmos.
column12: Pelikeeper is a tower defense & base building comfort-strategy game where you play as the last pelican in a world swallowed by a shadowy fog. Build up and defend the settlement around your lighthouse, rescue lost animal neighbors, and return constellations to the cosmos.
column13: Merge Conflict is a 5 person indie studio creating heartfelt games. Founded by a group of friends out of UT Austin, we developed Re:Fresh and Gemporium: A Cute Mining Sim and are currently working to develop Pelikeeper!
